name: fis-architecture
description: Federal Intelligence System (FIS) 3.2 Lite - Simplified multi-agent workflow framework. FIS manages workflow, QMD manages content. File-based ticket system with badge generation.
author: CyberMao

forAgents.whenToUse: Complex multi-role tasks requiring workflow tracking
forAgents.whenNotToUse: Simple queries or tasks completable in < 10 minutes
forAgents.keyDecision: Use decision tree to determine SubAgent delegation

postInstall.message: FIS 3.2 requires no initialization. Create ticket files directly.
